menu.title: Greek Salad
menu.description: The famous greek salad of crispy lettuce, peppers, olives and our Chicago style feta cheese, garnished with crunchy garlic and rosemary croutons.

menu.title: Bruchetta
menu.description: Our Bruschetta is made from grilled bread that has been smeared with garlic and seasoned with salt and olive oil.
